name: Quaking Stomp
summary: You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake.
description:
You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake, with the effects of the earthquake spell.Traits

Manipulate: You must physically manipulate an item or make gestures to use an action with this trait. Creatures without a suitable appendage canâ€™t perform actions with this trait. Manipulate actions often trigger reactions.

Rage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
